scripts.dev: [ -z "$OPENAI_TOKEN" ] && echo "Error: OPENAI_TOKEN environment variable is not set. Please set it before running the development environment." && exit 1 || concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:client" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.dev:backend: [ -z "$OPENAI_TOKEN" ] && echo "Error: OPENAI_TOKEN environment variable is not set. Please set it before running the backend." && exit 1 || wrangler dev --var OPENAI_TOKEN:$OPENAI_TOKEN --var ENVIRONMENT:development
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
